metadata.title: CVE-2021-37979 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: heap buffer overflow in WebRTC in Google Chrome prior to 94.0.4606.81allowed a remote attacker who convinced a user to browse to a maliciouswebsite to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
